channel.title: What's session id and how can i get it?
channel.description: Hello! I know that's a stupid question, by the way, what's session ID and how can i get it using c++?

item.title: What's session id and how can i get it?
item.dc:creator: mak
item.description:
the session ID is used to to know who a user is without needing to send username and password in every single request.

we’ll look at adding function to obtain session ID in future.

Read full topic
